bug.author: bhack
bug.description: Google is a member of CCI. What do you think to add <denchmark-link:https://bestpractices.coreinfrastructure.org>CCI badge</denchmark-link> to TF repository?

comments.comment: Sure. I think we're meeting these criteria, we just have to apply.
It has been 14 days with no activity and the awaiting tensorflower label was assigned. Please update the label and/or status accordingly.
Nagging Assigneee: It has been 14 days with no activity and this issue has an assignee. Please update the label and/or status accordingly.
We're not done with this, but the badge tracks progress, so closing this seems appropriate.
